Bolarinwa Owuogba

bola.owuogba@gmail.com

> About

I'm a software engineer who works at a broad scope and highly technical level with skills in general software engineering, linux and cloud computing with GCP.

I'm fascinated with the culture around DevOps and building reliable systems that scale.

When I'm not in front of a computer hacking at my console/editor, you'll find me enjoying anime with a nice cup of tea.

VISITS: 0

> Experience

Freelance Software Engineer

Technologies: GCP, React, DynamoDB, Docker, Firebase, New Relic One

  • Built several services for the backend of a microservices architecture application using TypeScript, ExpressJS and Firebase.
  • Built a real-time point-of-sale payment solution for receiving cryptocurrency payments in fiat using telegram and Bybit.
  • Set up logging and monitoring using Papertrail and New Relic One
  • Built a single page web app using React and Socket.io to enable customers to track the processing of their payments.
  • Automated processing of received payments to improve customer response times by over 50%.

Nuture Hill - Full-stack Software Engineer

Technologies: React, Express, PostgreSQL, Heroku, GCP

  • Designed and implemented a custom form builder (light-weight Google forms functionality)
  • API and database design and implementation for core application functionality.
  • Implemented an authentication system from scratch using JWTs.
  • Integrated frontend with API backend.
